wybug_detail:

Database: sohu_wineDatabase: olympicDatabase: cbaDatabase: golfDatabase: adidasDatabase: worldcupDatabase: manageDatabase: fashionDatabase: mysqlDatabase: nbaDatabase: poll ...太多，不一一列了。非DBA权限未深入。赶紧排查吧~
